adangu wiya haki wisheshanga[sanskaranaya] ·	kalaguna prawruththi ha niwedana ·	upades thiru ·	chithrapati, natya ha awanhal gana wiwarnathawa ·	karthruge adahas ·	oopadupa kolama ·	wihilu thiraya ha wenath winodathmaka anga uda - pradgalika saha jothishya ·	kridawata wenwu kotasa ·	wihilu katha walata wen wu kotasa ·	aahara warga sandaha thiruwa ·	deshiya saha kuda puwath path wala luhundu danwim samanyayen daknata labe.
